DOC.brief_summary: Primary : To evaluate effect multiple dos lecozotan SR PK profile single dose digoxin healthy adult subject . Secondary : To assess safety tolerability coadministration lecozotan SR digoxin .
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluating Potential Pharmacokinetic ( PK ) Interaction Between Lecozotan Digoxin
DOC.criteria: Women non childbearing potential men age 18 55 year screen . Body mass index ( BMI ) range 18 30 kg/m2 body weight 50 kg ( BMI = weight ( kg ) / [ height ( ) ] Presence history disorder may prevent successful completion study . Any clinically important deviation normal limit physical examination , vital sign clinical laboratory test result .
